channel.title: Is Souncloud Pro worth it?
channel.description: Pretty much everyonw in auxy uses soundcloud just wondering your opinion.

item.title: Is Souncloud Pro worth it?
item.dc:creator: obexg
item.description:
I haven’t used it but I want to see what it is like.

Read full topic

item.title: Is Souncloud Pro worth it?
item.dc:creator: Aqzi
item.description:
I’ve run out of minutes. it’s annoying as heck, so I guess pro would be good right about now. (I don’t have it. but if you wanna keep uploading then you gotta get it eventually)

Read full topic

item.title: Is Souncloud Pro worth it?
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
I had it for awhile. If you want to be able to replace audio files and not lose comments, it’s a must. You get more upload time, but for the cost, I’d rather showcase my best / newest work there and funnel people toward something like BandCamp or etc. Other than musicians I legit don’t know “normal” people who use it…

Read full topic

item.title: Is Souncloud Pro worth it?
item.dc:creator: kheeshKP
item.description:
It depends on three things:

1.) Whether you want to go further or not with posting on SoundCloud and making your name more widespread

2.) How much of an audience you have right now that is consistently coming back to see your content

3.) how you are planning to advertise and promote your content

That’s it

EDIT: i haven’t read any of the other replies so sorry if i repeated something

Read full topic

item.title: Is Souncloud Pro worth it?
item.dc:creator: El1011
item.description:
I’m with @NightOwl on this one. Unless you feel like you’re really going somewhere with music, have a good following, and is putting in the work to branch out & expand your brand, I wouldn’t suggest it.
I don’t have it because I don’t feel like I’ve fulfilled any of those things mentioned, and I’m still doing fine. I don’t have enough “good” tracks to really warrant the extra time either.

Read full topic

item.title: Is Souncloud Pro worth it?
item.dc:creator: DJ_La_Rocca
item.description:
Depends on ur dedication with music? If u plan to have an ongoing career with it and plan to put out a lot of tracks then it’s definitly worth it. Wish I had it many years ago where I wouldn’t have to delete tracks to free up play minutes

Read full topic

item.title: Is Souncloud Pro worth it?
item.dc:creator: NightOwl
item.description:
I use the free plan. I honestly think that pro is only worth it if you’re already an artist with a decent following to where you can bring in a profit. Otherwise there’s already so much you can do with free so why pay if you aren’t at a point that it’s worth it.

Read full topic
